id,
patient_number,
patient_name,

age,
number,

mapper.update:
update patient_info
patient_number = #{patientNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bed_number = #{bedNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update patient_info set patient_number = #{patientNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bed_number = #{bedNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
